modName: Dragon Priest Mask Remover for Requiem
summary: A purely cosmetic mod for use with Requiem. Alters all Dragon Priest masks so that they don't show up on your character's model - your character's head remains visible. The masks retain their stats from Requiem.
descriptionHtml:
A purely cosmetic mod for use with Requiem. Alters all Dragon Priest masks so that they don't show up on your character's model - your character's head remains visible. The masks retain their stats from Requiem.

There are two files: one affects vanilla masks and the other Dragonborn masks. Neither depends on the other, you're free to use either one or both.

Obviously, the Requiem mod is required. The Dragonborn version also requires Dragonborn and the Dragonborn Requiem patch.

If you do not use Requiem, try the following mod instead:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13371/?
author: Owoc
